column4: Hey, I want to install firefox 1.5.0.2, and I was wondering: Should I compile from source, or follow the directions for the default tar.gz that you can download (instructions:https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FirefoxNewVersion)
If there is documentation on the wiki I would follow that
I would go with the the tar.gz - it won't take as long
if you're in gnome-terminal just add shift for your ctrl-c/v type stuff
